actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A resolution to authorize the President to proclaim the second Sunday in September of each year as Bataan Day.

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President to issue annually a proclamation designating the second Sunday of September of each year as Bataan Day.

titles.title: A resolution to authorize the President to proclaim the second Sunday in September of each year as Bataan Day.
